sense.def:
A sight
je nekaj, kar vidimo, ali gledanje nečesa.

seg.quote: This was the most encouraging sight I'd seen all day.
He was reduced to tears at the sight of the hundreds of dead bodies.

sense.def:
The sights
so zanimivi kraji, ki jih pogosto obiskujejo turisti.

To sight someone or something
pomeni videti nekoga ali nekaj za kratek čas ali nepričakovano.

seg.quote: The missing woman has been sighted in the Birmingham area.

sense.def:
Nekaj je
a sight better
ali
a sight worse than a similar thing
, kadar je veliko boljše ali slabše od nečesa podobnega;

seg.quote: It's a damn sight better than most of the places we've stayed in.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in sight
, tisto lahko vidimo. Kadar je nekaj
out of sight
, tistega ne moremo videti.

seg.quote: As soon as the car was out of sight, we relaxed.

sense.def:
To catch sight of someone
pomeni zagledati nekoga nepričakovano ali za kratek čas.

seg.quote: She caught sight of her mother.

sense.def:
Kadar nekoga poznamo
by sight
, ga prepoznamo, ko ga vidimo, vendar nismo še nikoli govorili z njim.

Kadar nekdo dobi ukaz
to shoot on sight
, mora streljati na nekoga drugega takoj, ko ga opazi.

seg.quote: They used to shoot on sight in those days.

sense.def:
Kadar je rezultat ali odločitev
in sight
, bo verjetno kmalu prišlo do nje.

seg.quote: It seemed that an end to his agony was in sight.

sense.def:
To lose sight of an important feature or detail
pomeni, da neki pomembni značilnosti ali podrobnosti ne posvečamo več pozornosti, ker se ukvarjamo z manj pomembnimi stvarmi.

seg.quote: We mustn't get so bogged down by detail that we lose sight of our main objectives.

sense.def:
To set one's sights on something
pomeni, da smo trdno odločeni, da bomo nekaj dobili ali dosegli.

seg.quote: We have set our sights on a bigger house.
